name: Air Fryer Chicken Taquitos with Salsa Dip
description: Crispy rolled tortillas stuffed with smoked chicken and cheddar, air-fried in minutes and served with salsa, sour cream, and a simple lettuce side.
prep_steps: Preheat air fryer to 200°C/390°F for 3 minutes.
Shred the smoked chicken breast into small pieces.
Warm tortillas in the microwave for 20–30 seconds to make them flexible.
Set out salsa, sour cream, and lettuce for serving.
cook_steps: Lay out tortillas and add a thin line of shredded smoked chicken breast and cheddar cheese down the center of each.
Roll each tortilla tightly into a taquito; place seam-side down.
Lightly brush or spray the taquitos with olive oil.
Arrange taquitos in the air fryer basket in a single layer (work in batches if needed).
Air fry for 6–8 minutes at 200°C/390°F until golden and crisp, turning once halfway.
Serve hot with salsa and sour cream for dipping, with lettuce on the side.
